articles.title: Argentina’s coach Lionel Scaloni voted as best coach, beating France’s Deshcamps, by IFFHS
articles.description: Under his managerial stint, Argentina have won the 2021 Copa America, the 2022 World Cup as well as the La Finalissima against European champions, Italy.
articles.content:
Lionel Scaloni, who coached Argentina to the world-cup triumph, was named the best coach of a national team in 2022 by the International Federation of Football History and Statistics (IFFHS).

articles.title: GRAINS-Soybeans extend gains on Argentina drought, wheat firms

articles.description: Scaloni was invited back by the club he was loaned to for an official pre-match ceremony at the San Moix ahead of the home team's La Liga match.
articles.content: Lionel Scaloni played at Mallorca for less than one season. Into his final years as a player, Scaloni went to the La Liga club on loan from Lazio for the 2008/09 season at the end of which he went back to the Serie A side. However, 14 years later, th... [1141 chars]

articles.description: In the Instagram post Papu Gomez posted a picture of his tattoo with Martinez making the saving with the number 122'43" underneath. The 122'43" is the time at which the Argentinan goalie made the match-saving effort.
